import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {getPosts} from '../../store/actions/postAction' import NavList from '../../components/navigation/NavList' import Header from '../../components/header/Header' import Status from '../../components/home/Status' import PostCard from '../../components/post/PostCard' import RightSideBar from '../../components/home/RightSideBar' import styles from './Home.module.css'; export default function Home() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {auth, post} = useSelector(state=>state); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getPosts(auth)); },[auth]) return ( <>
{post && post.posts.map(post=>( ))}
) }
